data.prayer: Lord, make the 35,751 believers in Magallanes y Antártica Chilena to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 119,549 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena, Chile
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena, Chile.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 35,751 believers in the state of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pashtun, Northern people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Magallanes y Antártica Chilena.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 35,751 believers in Magallanes y Antártica Chilena, Chile a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena, Chile has a population of 155,300.

We estimate Magallanes y Antártica Chilena has 35,751 people who might know Jesus, 99,565 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,984 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Magallanes y Antártica Chilena who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
